name: Alpaca
tagline: Commission-free stock trading API for developers
description: Alpaca provides commission-free trading APIs enabling developers to build trading apps. Features real-time market data, paper trading, and fractional shares.

name: Two Sigma
description: Two Sigma is a technology company that applies a rigorous, scientific method-based approach to investment management using AI and machine learning.

name: Kensho
tagline: AI solutions for financial analytics (S&P Global)
description: Kensho, a part of S&P Global, develops AI and machine learning technologies that help financial professionals make better decisions through data analysis.

name: Numerai
tagline: AI hedge fund built by crowdsourced data scientists
description: Numerai is an AI-powered hedge fund that crowdsources machine learning models from thousands of data scientists worldwide using cryptocurrency incentives.

name: Kavout
tagline: AI-powered equity analysis and stock ranking
description: Kavout uses AI and machine learning to analyze billions of data points and provide equity rankings and investment insights.

name: Accern
tagline: NLP platform for financial market intelligence
description: Accern provides a no-code AI platform that helps financial services firms extract insights from unstructured data using natural language processing.

name: QuantConnect
description: QuantConnect provides an open-source algorithmic trading platform for designing, building, and deploying quantitative trading strategies.

name: Betterment
description: Betterment is a leading robo-advisor offering automated portfolio management, tax-loss harvesting, and goal-based financial planning.

name: Wealthfront
description: Wealthfront offers automated investment management with features like tax-loss harvesting, direct indexing, and financial planning tools.

name: Addepar
description: Addepar provides a wealth management platform that aggregates, analyzes, and reports on complex investment portfolios for RIAs and family offices.

name: Vise
description: Vise builds AI-powered investment management technology that enables financial advisors to create personalized portfolios at scale.

name: Titan
description: Titan is an investment app that gives everyday investors access to actively managed portfolios previously reserved for the ultra-wealthy.

name: Upstart
tagline: AI lending platform beyond FICO scores
description: Upstart is an AI lending platform that uses machine learning to assess creditworthiness beyond traditional FICO scores.

name: Zest AI
description: Zest AI provides software that helps lenders make better underwriting decisions using explainable machine learning models.

name: Figure
description: Figure uses blockchain technology to offer home equity lines of credit, mortgage refinancing, and personal loans with faster processing.

name: Ocrolus
description: Ocrolus provides document automation software that analyzes financial documents to accelerate lending decisions.

name: Blend
description: Blend provides a digital lending platform that powers mortgage, consumer lending, and deposit account applications.

name: Chainalysis
description: Chainalysis provides blockchain data and analysis to government agencies, exchanges, and financial institutions for compliance and investigation.

name: Featurespace
description: Featurespace provides real-time fraud and financial crime prevention using adaptive behavioral analytics and machine learning.

name: Alloy
description: Alloy provides an identity decisioning platform that helps banks and fintechs automate KYC, AML, and fraud prevention.

name: Sardine
description: Sardine provides a fraud prevention and compliance platform that uses device intelligence and behavior biometrics.

name: Unit21
tagline: No-code fraud and AML detection platform
description: Unit21 offers a no-code platform for fraud and money laundering detection, enabling companies to build rules and ML models without engineering.

name: Lemonade
tagline: AI-powered insurance for home, auto, pet
description: Lemonade uses AI and behavioral economics to offer renters, homeowners, car, pet, and life insurance with instant claims processing.

name: Tractable
tagline: AI for accident and disaster recovery
description: Tractable develops AI for visual assessment of vehicles and property, helping insurers process claims faster through photo analysis.

name: Shift Technology
description: Shift Technology provides AI-native SaaS solutions for insurance fraud detection, claims automation, and underwriting.

name: Hippo
tagline: Smart home insurance with IoT integration
description: Hippo offers home insurance with smart home device integration, proactive protection, and a modern digital experience.

name: Stripe
description: Stripe builds economic infrastructure for the internet, enabling businesses to accept payments, manage subscriptions, and handle financial operations.

name: Plaid
tagline: Open banking APIs connecting apps to banks
description: Plaid enables applications to connect with users' bank accounts through APIs, powering thousands of fintech apps.

name: Marqeta
description: Marqeta provides a modern card issuing platform for creating, managing, and processing payment cards with just-in-time funding.

name: Ramp
description: Ramp provides corporate cards with built-in spend management, expense tracking, and automated savings recommendations.

name: Mercury
description: Mercury provides banking services designed for startups, with features like easy integrations, team management, and API access.

name: Column
description: Column is a nationally chartered bank that provides banking infrastructure, enabling companies to build financial products on its platform.

name: Bloomberg
description: Bloomberg provides financial data, news, and analytics to financial professionals worldwide through the Bloomberg Terminal and other services.

name: Orbital Insight
description: Orbital Insight uses AI to analyze satellite imagery and geospatial data for investment insights like tracking retail traffic and oil storage.

name: AlphaSense
description: AlphaSense is an AI-based market intelligence platform that enables searching and analyzing millions of documents for financial insights.

name: Tegus
tagline: Expert network and primary research platform
description: Tegus provides an expert network and primary research platform with transcripts and expert calls for investment research.

name: Fireblocks
description: Fireblocks provides enterprise-grade digital asset custody, transfer, and settlement using MPC-based wallet technology.

name: Gauntlet
description: Gauntlet provides economic modeling and risk management for DeFi protocols using simulation and optimization.

name: Nansen
description: Nansen provides blockchain analytics with wallet labels, tracking smart money movements, NFT trends, and DeFi metrics.

name: Alchemy
description: Alchemy provides blockchain developer tools and infrastructure, powering major Web3 applications with reliable APIs.

name: Anchorage
description: Anchorage Digital is a federally chartered crypto bank providing custody, trading, and staking services for institutions.

name: Circle
description: Circle is the issuer of USDC stablecoin and provides payments infrastructure for businesses using blockchain technology.

name: Coinbase
description: Coinbase is a publicly traded cryptocurrency exchange offering trading, custody, and institutional services.

name: Uniswap
description: Uniswap is a decentralized exchange protocol on Ethereum enabling automated token trading through liquidity pools.

name: Anthropic
tagline: AI safety company building reliable AI
description: Anthropic develops large-scale AI systems focused on safety, interpretability, and reliability. Their Claude AI assistant serves enterprise and consumer applications.

name: OpenAI
description: OpenAI is an AI research and deployment company. Their models power countless financial applications from document analysis to customer service.

name: Cohere
description: Cohere provides enterprise-grade large language models and NLP capabilities for business applications.

name: Weights & Biases
description: Weights & Biases provides an MLOps platform for tracking experiments, visualizing results, and collaborating on machine learning projects.

name: Scale AI
description: Scale AI provides high-quality training data and AI infrastructure for machine learning teams building AI applications.

name: Hugging Face
tagline: Open-source ML platform and model hub
description: Hugging Face is the AI community's hub for sharing models, datasets, and applications, with open-source tools for NLP and ML.

name: Cleo
description: Cleo is an AI-powered financial assistant that helps users manage money through conversational AI, budgeting, and savings features.

name: Copilot Money
description: Copilot is a personal finance app using AI to help users track spending, manage budgets, and achieve financial goals.

name: Rocket Money
description: Rocket Money (formerly Truebill) helps users track subscriptions, lower bills, and manage their finances automatically.

name: YNAB
description: You Need A Budget (YNAB) is a personal budgeting app based on zero-based budgeting methodology.

name: Cape Analytics
description: Cape Analytics uses AI and geospatial imagery to provide property intelligence for insurance underwriting and risk assessment.

name: ComplyAdvantage
description: ComplyAdvantage provides AI-driven financial crime detection with real-time risk data on sanctions, watchlists, and PEPs.
